If you're looking for something more unique and different, then "Sucker Punch" (2011) starring Ian Tracey and Oscar Isaac might be your cup of tea. The plot explores a young girl's journey of escape from an abusive stepfather.

If you're interested in a darker and more satirical take on revenge, then "Inglourious Basterds" (2009) starring Samm Levine and Christian Berkel is a must-watch. The plot revolves around a vengeful plan by a theatre owner against the Nazis during World War II.

If you're seeking a film with a dark and brooding atmosphere, then "Hannibal Rising" (2007) starring Richard Brake and Stephen Walters is a great choice. The plot depicts a young man's journey of revenge and darkness.
